tweet: After many months of a great team effort, we finally have our website finished! I hope you’ll check it out! www.joyberrybooks.com
Thank you Andrew, for adding me to the http://wefollow.com twitter directory under: #kids #children #author
JBE just filmed me doing a Summer Safety presentation for the amazing kids at PS321. I’ll let you know when its ready to watch online!
We just welcomed Kaytee Button to our family--a new Teddy Bear Hamster. My Grandaughters are learning more about being responsible!
I was given a great opportunity to answer some "most asked" questions and the video is on My Space. http://www.myspace.com/joyberrybooks
